packing_requirements: Sufficiently and properly packed for transport, at vendor's expense. Cable must be wound on strong wooden drums. Ends of cable sealed with rubber or PVC caps. Drum length tolerance: +5% / -2% of nominal length.
insurance_responsibility: Vendor/Supplier (Comprehensive risk coverage at supplier's own cost)
payment_terms: 100% payment after receipt and acceptance of materials on pro-rata basis.
taxes_and_duties: Taxes (GST, duties) to be indicated separately in percentage. If silent, rates are presumed inclusive of taxes & duties.
warranty_terms: Minimum one year from the date of supply and acceptance.

financial_instruments.performance_bank_guarantee: 3% of the total value, valid till the warranty period plus 2 months grace.
financial_instruments.security_deposit: 3% of the contract price, valid till completion of total contractual obligation plus 90 days.
